name: Galaxy Bug: Space Shooter
description:
Memories of the game !! Best hitting feeling !!
The best arcade room !! Bang~ !!

A game that can be played with children !!
I felt like I was playing in a childhood recreation room!
Revive the memory
Indie game released in 2017 !!!
The ultimate shooter game !!

You can upgrade your fighters by collecting your airframe cards.
Fighters, wings, helper, shields and cool units appear.
You can use bombs to defeat your enemies at once.
Various bosses threaten players.

Retro-style clean and stylish production, anyone can easily enjoy the game.

[Game Features]

● You can enjoy the game with simple operation.
● Combine various fighters to enjoy the game.
● Various bosses appear.
● Open the box to reward and collect new fighters.
● You can strengthen the fighter and build the strongest battle deck.
● Perform challenges and missions and receive gifts
● Test your ability to compete with people around the world.

This game is available for purchase of partial paid items. Partial toll items may incur additional costs and may be subject to withdrawal depending on the item type.

You can see the game news on the link below.
